title: doc/style.css: Incorrect lay-out package list with long import paths
body:
The web lay-out generated by godoc with the list of packages looks fine when there are
only the standard packages, but not when you have installed more packages with a long
import path, like "github.com/rug-compling/alpinocorpus-go/alpinocorpus",
because the browser splits parts with a hyphen over two lines.

Adding this to doc/style.css fixes this problem:

    div#page.wide table.dir tr > td:first-child {
        white-space: nowrap;
    }

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

    go version weekly.2012-03-27

Please provide any additional information below.

Browsers showing this problem:

  - Opera 11.62
  - Chromium 6.0.472.63
  - Epiphany Webbrowser 2.30.6

In all cases, the problem disappears when applying my proposed fix.
